items.name: BBQ Chicken
items.description: Marinated chicken with spices, grilled and served with sweet and sourt sauce.

items.name: BBQ Spareribs
items.description: Pork spareribs prepared in traditional Thai style, served with steamed vegetables.

items.name: Chana Thai Fried Chicken
items.description: Deep-fried chicken legs and thighs, prepared in Thai stye, served with spicy and sour sauce.

items.name: Chana Thai Wings
items.description: Deep-fried chicken wings mixed with chili paste sauce.

items.name: Hot Wings
items.description: Deep-fried chicken wings mised with hot and spicy sauce.

items.name: Orange Chicken
items.description: Deep-fried chicken wings mixed with hot and spicy sauce.

items.name: Lemon Chicken
items.description: Deep-fried white meat chicken with special lemon sauce.

items.name: Sriracha Chicken
items.description: Deep-fried white meat chicken with Sriracha sauce.

items.name: Salmon Teriyaki
items.description: Grilled salmon with teriyaki sauce, served with steamed rice and steamed vegetables.

items.name: Salmon Garlic
items.description: Grilled salmon, topped with garlic sauce. Served with rice and steamed vegetable.

items.name: Chana Thai Salmon
items.description: Grilled salmon, topped with Thai chili paste sauce, served with steamed rice and steamed vegetables.

items.name: Shrimp and Scallop Garlic Sauce
items.description: Stir-fried shrimp and scallop with garlic sauce.

items.name: Spicy Shrimp and Scallop
items.description: Shrimp and scallop with bell peppers, onion, carrot, and basil leabes in our spicy sauce.

items.name: Spicy Combination Seafood
items.description: Combination of shrimp, fish, squid, scallop, mussel, imitation crab, onion, bell peppers, carrot and basil in spicy sauce.

items.name: Fried Fish with Garlic Sauce
items.description: Crispy deep-fried fish, topped with garlic sauce.

items.name: Fried Fish with Spicy Basil
items.description: Crispy deep-fried fish with bell peppers, onion, carrot, and basil in our spicy sauce.
